pageProduct.name: Redwin Sorbolene Body Wash with Vitamin E 1 Litre
pageProduct.description:
General Information

with plant derived glycerine

restoring with vitamin E

Redwin sensitive skin sorbolene body wash is the perfect soap free alternative. It doesn't contain the ingredient sodium lauryl sulfate (SLS), a harsh surfactant (cleanser) and known skin irritant for sensitive skin. Its restoring nature locks in moisture whilst gently cleansing the entire body making it a preferred body wash for dry and sensitive skin, suitable for the whole family.

- Soap free
- SLS free
- Fragrance free
- pH balanced

What Is Redwin Sorbolene Body Wash With Vitamin E For?
Effective daily moisturising cleanser for the whole family. Sorbolene leaves your skin smooth and moisturised whilst added vitamin e gives antioxidant support and aids healthy skin.

Who Is Redwin Sorbolene Body Wash With Vitamin E For?
Suitable for all skin types, the body wash is suitable for anyone wanting a body wash that cleans dirt and grime off the body but is gentle to the skin. Ideal for sensitive skin.

When Should I Use Redwin Sorbolene Body Wash With Vitamin E?
When showering or bathing.

Why Should I Use Redwin Sorbolene Body Wash With Vitamin E?
It not only cleans skin, but leaves it hydrated and feeling smooth and soft.

Suitable For: Suitable for all over body use.

Size: 1L

Warnings

n/a

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Sodium Laureth Sulphate, Ammonium Lauryl Sulphate, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sorbitol, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Cocamide DEA, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Sodium Chloride, PEG-7 glyceryl Cocoate, Citric Acid, Triticum Vulare (Wheat Germ) Oil, Tertasodium EDTA, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone.

Suitable for a halal diet

Contains: n/a

Allergen Contains: Null

Allergen May Be Present: Null

Allergen Free From: n/a

Directions

Lather the desired amount into hand or soft cloth and massage in a circular motion into the skin. For best results, massage Redwin sorbolene moisturiser into areas prone to dryness after bathing.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C

Storage Temperature: 30°C
